title: Digital Watch Face
summary: Android wear digital watch face with Calls and Messages Notification
description: Android Wear Digital Watch face is perhaps the most attractive watch face you would require in matching your daily color choices with your watch face. With Android Digital watch face, you not only get date and time displayed in a digital pattern, but it also provide battery info of the device. Adding more to it, you also get notified for new SMS and missed calls right away on your watch face without having to even tap on the screen.  Digital watch face also comes with its companion app on your Android phone that lets you entirely customize your watch face. So, there is nothing to wait for, simple download this free watch face and change the way your wearable looks.Please feel free to send us your feedback. Your feedback is important to us. Kindly rate us good. Your good rating keeps us going!
descriptionHTML:
Android Wear Digital Watch face is perhaps the most attractive watch face you would require in matching your daily color choices with your watch face. With Android Digital watch face, you not only get date and time displayed in a digital pattern, but it also provide battery info of the device. Adding more to it, you also get notified for new SMS and missed calls right away on your watch face without having to even tap on the screen. Digital watch face also comes with its companion app on your Android phone that lets you entirely customize your watch face. So, there is nothing to wait for, simple download this free watch face and change the way your wearable looks.
Please feel free to send us your feedback. Your feedback is important to us. Kindly rate us good. Your good rating keeps us going!
